name: Whateverjobs.com
overview:
Whateverjobs is an employment portal where job seekers and employers can connect to find and fill job openings.

The company promotes it’s “whatever” attitude by allowing virtually any job or resume to be posted, in numerous job categories. Their slogan states “A Place for Any Job, No Matter What”.

It offers free resume postings, and job board postings are $25 for six months. Users also have unlimited member to member messaging communication and visitors can access additional tools and articles relating to the employment field.
